name: SlapMoon
description:
Slapmoon is an arcade game where the player controls the frustrated moon, since the humans have decided to conolize it by having no more space to populate on Earth.

For playing, just click on the left or right side of the screen to hit destroy the invaders!

Credits:

Bruno Bibbó
Dani Carco
David P. Cogolludo
Jorge Gómez
Luis Alejo
María Mingot

Github: https://github.com/DavidCogolludo/MOONSHOT
